items.name: Ales Mixed Case
items.desc:
An ever-changing mixed case of 24 × cans of Villages ales. Currently the case includes:
6 × RODEO Pale Ale • 4.6%
One of our first pals. Rodeo is a light straw colour with a gentle haze. Citrus and grapefruit aromas and flavours come from Citra and Cascade, giving a balanced floral tone. Low bitterness and a soft body. Real refreshing!
6 × RAFIKI Session IPA • 4.3%
Our low-strength IPA, and a family fave. Tropical notes of mango, passionfruit and guava come from Mosaic and Ekuanot. Smooth bitterness and a sweet biscuity malt flavour.
6 × TOTO American Pale • 5.3%
Toto is a 5.3% American Pale hopped with Idaho 7, Simcoe and Ekuanot and fermented with London Ale III. Real haps with this one! Full-bodied, lovely soft bitterness. Tropical, citrus and pine flaves. Limited run!
6 × DOOZY Citra & Mosaic IPA • 6%
Doozy is a 6% IPA hopped with Mosaic & Citra and fermented with Coastal Haze. This one's a doozy.
~~~~~~~
Vegan friendly! :-D
330ml cans
£5.99 delivery

items.desc:
RAFIKI is one of our go-to regulars, our low-strength IPA, and a family fave. Tropical notes of mango, passionfruit and guava come from Mosaic and Ekuanot. Smooth bitterness and a sweet biscuity malt flavour.

items.name: Regulars Mixed Case
items.desc:
A mixed case of 24 × cans of go-to Villages bevs.
8 × RODEO Pale Ale • 4.6%
One of our first pals. Rodeo is a light straw colour with a gentle haze. Citrus and grapefruit aromas and flavours come from Citra and Cascade, giving a balanced floral tone. Low bitterness and a soft body. Real refreshing!
8 × WHISTLE Pilsner • 4.4%
A crisp, unfiltered Pilsner with lots of flavour. Saaz and Hallertau Mittelfrüh give it those traditional floral and spicy notes. The yeast gives a big ester profile and a clean finish.
8 × RAFIKI Session IPA • 4.3%
Our low-strength IPA, and a family fave. Tropical notes of mango, passionfruit and guava come from Mosaic and Ekuanot. Smooth bitterness and a sweet biscuity malt flavour.
~~~~~~~
Vegan friendly! :-D
330ml cans
£5.99 delivery
